answers.answer: hi,this is not a fasting test, and you can also take your regular meds on the morning of the test.  HOwever, you can always call the lab to double check.

Hi there,You're A1c test is not a fasting test, BUT usually when you go to your endo. or phys. to get labs done, especially if you have diabetes, they will most likely want to do a cholesterol test, which IS a fasting test. This test will be very good info for keeping up with your overall health. If I were you, I would just skip breakfast or lunch, whatever is closer to your app.

Thankyou Ladies for responding so quickly , I still have a lot to learn about Diabetes and the effects of different foods on my blood glucose. My test results were ok so I must be doing something right lol!. Thanks again.Best wishesAngie

question: Hi,I am going for a HbA1c blood test and  can,t remember if it is a fasting blood test, I am not having any other tests with it like cholesterol etc ? . I  would also like to know if I should still take my diabetic meds as usual ,which are metformin and byetta? and should I skip breakfast on the morning of the test?.Thankyou for any help or advice you can give me.Angie
title: HbA1c  blood test
